name: Hardest Rhyme Time- Politics! Trivia Quiz | Word Play | 10 Questions

questions.text:
Please note: This quiz was written several years ago when punctuation was allowed in Fill in the Blank quizzes. This means you WILL need to include apostrophes in the answer if appropriate.

Both Al Gore and George W. Bush wanted to live in the...
What fastens Al Gore's wife's clothes?
In the Florida controversy, an unsatisfactory piece of paper that failed to fall from a ballot could have been called a?

questions.correct: Bush's tush & Bush tush & Bush's toosh & Bush toosh
questions.explanation: Bush's tush & Bush tush & Bush's toosh & Bush toosh.

questions.text: I am sure Al spoke a few invectives when he heard the Supreme Court's decision.. In other words-
Some enterprising soul could make candies in the shape of a ballot box, a donkey, an elephant or perhaps a Vote-O-Matic. Such candies could be called ...
questions.correct: election confection & election confections & political skittles & political skittle & parties smarties
questions.explanation: election confection & election confections & political skittles & political skittle & parties smarties.

questions.text: Some members of Gore's party were criticizing him and pushing him to concede before he was ready. This pressure could be called ...
Did you hear that Ms.Clinton decided to start a whiskey business? She named her factories...
It's possible that, in an election, the Speaker of the House might be nervous and worried that he or she might not get re-elected. That would make that person a ...
When Joe Lieberman's wife cooks Polish sausages, what does she make?
questions.correct: Hadassah's kielbasas & Hadassah's kielbasas & Hadassah kielbasas
questions.explanation: Hadassah's kielbasas & Hadassah's kielbasas & Hadassah kielbasas.
